lead_paragraph: Readers variously object to and applaud the New York governor’s action.

headline.print_headline: Governor Cuomo and the B.D.S. Movement
headline.main: Governor Cuomo and the B.D.S. Movement

snippet: Readers variously object to and applaud the New York governor’s action.
abstract: Letter from New York City Council member Rory I Lancman comments on June 13 Op-Ed article by Daniel Sieradski on Gov Andrew M Cuomo's executive order regarding groups supporting movement to boycott, divest from and sanction Israel.
